description:
She has a loving family and best friends. She laughs and cries from time to time. Madoka Kaname - an eighth grader who lives such a peaceful life. One night, she has a strange dream. It was supposed to be an usual routine day, but the arrival of Homura Akemi - a transfer student who came to Madoka`s class, changed that.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: As If I Met Her in My Dream...
Come se fossimo incontrate in sogno
Yume no Naka de Atta, You na.....
夢の中で会った, ような.....
